content.detailedDescription: I was working at the airport and its about. 7:30am. i was fueling a plane and looking at these 2 stars and i catch a light heading between the stars. as the light gets closer to the stars,the 1 on the bottom started blinking,the 1 on the top starts blinking as the light goespast the stars. and the light disappeared. i had an erie filling. the light had no tracer, so it wasn't a shooting star.
content.summary: I was looking at the stars and seen a moving object go in between the 2 stars.Then disappear.

content.detailedDescription:
Four friends where visiting me in northern california at my house in gold mountain.  we had just finished a hike to eureka peak and where unwinding with a glass of wine before dinner. we where on the posterior deck of my house overlooking the feather river canyon.  the sky was mildly foggy/hazy.  we where partaking in conversation when i noticed a hovering, red "string-like" thing approximately 200 yds in the air over the canyon which seamed to fade in and out and hover up and down.  it then climbed and accelerated at a great speed and disappeared.  about 10 seconds later, it returned and hovered again.  we observed it for a few more minutes and then it,once again disappeared vertically upward at a great speed and disappeared.

we all agreed at what we saw, but being intelligent and intellectual people, we decided that we would keep it betwixt ourselves, especially since we all had a glass of wine or two.

a year later, i mentioned the incident with 3 of the friends and they all agreed it did happen, but did not want to pursue it further.
content.summary: Was on deck after hike in sierras with 4 friends ( we all saw it). a red string like lite hovered in a foggy/hazy sky for 5 minutes and then shot up at a fast speed. then returned and hovered again for a few minutes. we had been drinking wine, but all saw

content.detailedDescription: Since the beginning of june everynight i have seen these objects that look like stars that move but only back an forth or up and down but stationary. as of today they are still there. there are a couple of them that move coming from the end of property up towards my house then it would stay there like it was trying to be a star. then there is a larger one that hangs over a tree behind my house that moves back and forth  like it is studying something. i just want someone to tell me i am not crazy. my children and a couple of friends have seen it also. i just want to know what it is. can you please help me. i go outside everynight to see if they are there and they are there.  they are not close enough to get a picture of at least not with anything i have. i am genuinely scared and just want someone to validate what i am seeing is real and tell me what it is, please.  i have looked at it thru binoculars but then it just looks like distorted lights that are different colors on one and to bright to look at on the other. then as it gets daylight they disappear.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Looks like a star but it moves, will change colors like lights on a christmas tree. then there is a large one solid white that looks like star.

content.detailedDescription:
I just want to report this in case anyone who reads this has had a similar experience and wants to know if anyone else has. i don't care if anyone thinks this is bogus or not, i finally feel it is necessary to at least tell someone else about this. i was only 9 at the time, keep that in mind. i realize time and memory affect the ability to report events, but this memory has not changed.

it was early evening. i was with my parents and sibling, preparing to leave our grandparent's place. i pointed at this object, and said something about the sun being in a funny place. my mom looked and said that is not the sun it is right over there. the object approached and that is the last thing i remember before "coming around" in our pick-up truck, speeding away trying to get away, hearing my mom telling my dad to go keep going and get the hell out of here. the object was chasing us and i don't remember getting away, just that the next thing you know, everything is back to normal and we're driving home after having been trying to get away in the opposite direction. no one in my family will even talk about it. i think that's why i want to finally report this to someone, to get it off my chest.

the object really looked like the sun in the sky, except in the totally wrong place. and then it started wobbling and markedly pulsating, and then it began to approach. at that point i blacked out. trying to get away is the most vivid part of my memory, and the panicky fear that even my parents exhibited. my dad drove like mad, the engine was practically howling he had the gas pedal pegged to the floor. and then bam! nothing, everything right back to normal, driving in the opposite direction we headed to try and escape from this bizarre event.

i don't like remembering this, and that may also be another reason i am reporting this event. the lost time really, really bothers me. i'm not claiming abduction or after effects. i am just relaying information on an event whose memory has bothered me for 3 decades plus. do with it whatever you will, i feel a little better finally getting it out to someone who just might listen.
content.summary: Pulsing sun-like object hovered, approached and then loss of memory

content.detailedDescription: Driving south 0n 91 freeway, crystal clear day, caught sight of something odd hovering in far distance around anaheim hills,slowed down to observe it,and watched it dissappear. it seemed to say "i'm here and i looked way left, a there it was again! i tried to watch and pull off the freeway, and it vanished again, yet toying with me,now i'm over here. caught it again but while getting ready to pull off to see it better, i lost it. it looked like a metalic tea strainer hanging in the sky then taking off at such a speed i could'nt follow it. light reflecting off upper part, and black onlower part. fascinated,and a little scared,trying to make sense of it.Thought it was a helicopter, but it was'nt.Felt it was a ufo, and telepathically wanting me to know it.
content.summary: Saw it, vanished, communicated and reappeared different place several different times

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were walking out our front door to go to a lamaze class.  the front door of our home faces north.  my wife said "what is that it looks like it is on fire".  she pointed over the rooftop across the street and off in the distance on the horizon. i observed an object that was similar in size to a helicopter that was hovering due north of our location about 500 feet above the ground.  the object had what appeared to be red flare droplets falling from the underside and this was what caught our eyes. my wife asked if it was on fire and might crash.  the vehicle hovered in the same spot for about 30 seconds and then drifted slowly to the northeast.  as it drifted it tilted with the top showing that it was a sphere shaped object. the vehicle remained at this location for about 1 minute and then tilted back flat and the bottom side was red like a flare color.  the vehicle drifted to the east and came lower to the ground over the roofs to the east in the horizon.  as it got due east it simply sped off and vanished to the east in a flash.  i was a mesa police officer and reported it at work that night.  i am stll a sworn investigator today.  i reported this to the ufo bureau at davis monthan aft the next day. my wife was in nursing school .  the next week my wife was in class and learned that the mother of a fellow student had seen the same incident.  i heard this was reported to chandler pd.  i later learned that one of my friends wife had also seen this object the same night.  i am not positive of the date but this was between 1 to two months prior to my oldest son being born.  i also saw a 60 minutes ufo sighting report about a roswell new mexico cop seeing the same thing in his area around the same time.  it was never reported on the news at that time.  this occurred over a city area near the chandler -mesa border.
content.summary: My wife and i were both walking to our car and observed an object floating to the north.  viewed two min.       out one mile away.  the vehicle appeared to be on fire on the underside.  the vehicle was almost transparent and round on the top

content.detailedDescription:
I was travelling alone in my car on either highway 60 or 10 from riverside county to los angeles county. the approximate time was 6:30am; twilight dawn near the city of fontana or in that general area.

while driving, i noticed a lof the cars in front of me start to brake and slow down. the opposing traffic was doing the same. i thought there was an auto accident so i leaned forward to see where the accident was at on the freeway. i was in a hurry to get home and did not want to get stuck in traffic. i was commuting regularly back and forth between los angeles and  riverside.

all of sudden a large blue/white object came across the horizon at a high rate of speed. there was no other colored lights visible; just the solid blue/white light. it was oval/saucer shaped and very bright. it moved from north to south disappearing behind a line of trees lining the freeway. i would estimate it was no more than 500 ft. high in the air and i observed it at a distance of 500 ft to less than 1 mile. 

i then realized why other people ahead of me on the freeway started to brake and slow down. they saw the object before me and were reacting to it.
i immediately thought this was my first ufo encounter and couldn't believe i had witnessed such a strange event. it was a very surreal experience.

i also had a follow up event approximately 2 week later while traveling from los angeles to riverside on the same freeways in the same general area. when i complete this report, i will file my second encounter.

these events occurred 22 years ago and i still think about both today.
content.summary: Viewed large blue/white object while traveling west on hwy 60 or 10

content.detailedDescription:
Hot night, clear sky, i was laying on a cellar door on the east side of the house.  out in the country, twenty miles from the nearest town, a couple of miles from the nearest neighbor.  i slept in the attic and it was too hot to get into bed before 11 or midnight.  a shooting star seemed to be going across the sky when it came to a stop in the southeast sky at about 45 degrees from me.  absolutely quiet, not a sound, and no other lights.  as i watched in amazement, another "star" came from a different direction and joined the first to become one light.  and then a third came from another direction and joined the others and it was just one light afterwards.  then,it was like it went up into the air and out of sight in less than 10 seconds.  it was gone with no sign of exhaust, fire or any kind of a trail.  just like a shooting star going up and out of sight.

i never told anyone until lately because i thought they would think i was crazy or dreaming.  i was about 14 at the time.  i put 1958 but it could have been 1960.  i wasn't out there in 59.  probably too late and nobody else can verify but at least i hope you can find some value in my account.

it is true to the best of my memory.  i don't think this was anywhere close to the ground but i don't know how high it was.  probably hundreds or thousands of feet, it didn't seem to be very close.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3 shooting star like objects that came together from different directions and left as a single star

content.detailedDescription:
I just watched your show on bucks county ufo sightings and i didnt know there where other sightings the same time as mine. i was traveling south on rt. 13 at 1230am one night in august 2008 i dont remember exact date, as i was just about to pass station ave. ,a huge bright orange ball passed from west to east decending less than 500 ft in front of me and what looked to be just over the roof tops of the homes to my left,i only held visual contact for 1 to 2 seconds i stoped on the road right where it passed over but i couldnt see it anymore, i looked for other cars to see if someone else seen it but there where no cars on the road but me.Since i had seen it what kept running through my mind was that when that big thing hit the ground there was going to be a big explosion or that it would fall into one of the apartment complexes on station ave.I waited for a few mins with my cell phone in hand to call 911 if it did crash into something.Since it was summer i had my windows down and there was no noise when it passed by ,it looked like a huge fire ball with no trailing flames,and when i got tired of waiting to hear or see something i figured that what ever it was must have crashed in the delaware river and thats why i didnt hear or see the crash.Fast forward to your show when i seen the map with all the sightings there where the shapes of the sightings on the map and one symbol was flames and in the recreation you did with the 2 ufos in the picture i got the chills when i seen the bright orange ball  
 following behind the other ship. did anyone else see that big orange flame ball in bucks county??????? this would answer alot of questions for and raise a bunch of new ones please let me know and feel free to contact me with any addtional questions
content.summary: Huge low desending orange what looked to be flame ball

content.detailedDescription: I have invited you several times..We are in a hot area for sightings i got one of them on video. we have several guest to our home who have witnessed this as well. its nothing new to witness something in the skys here .
content.summary: I have invited mufon several times to my home we have had sighting after sighting,

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend (ex-roomate) met up on thanksgiving with the rest of the family. we had dinner at dad's house in clarinda, ia. we were on the interstate heading home when my friend mike asked me if i saw that. i said what are you talking about and he pointed up into the sky. i spotted what he saw which is what i would describe as a bright pure white circular object or orb. it was a white with no discernable shape or markings simply looked round. i began to run through a list of explanations of what this could be. i came to the conclusion it was one of those airplanes covered in shiny aluminum/reflective paintjob until it shot up into the sun. this is when we both realized it couldn't be a shiny surface as the object was brighter white than the sun. at the time the sun was pretty orange and i know a reflection can't be brighter and more intense than it's source. the object changed direction several times and shot out of sight in the direction we were travelling (west). we were both pretty shaken and it was obvious this was no ordinary aircraft just based on the sheer brightness of the object and the way it moved. it was changing directions and moving rapidly in the sky. we were both pretty freaked out about the whole ordeal and mike looked over at me and said "i'm not getting anal probed". i found it funny but he was very serious. we were both a little nervous about the whole thing. i told him to keep his eyes peeled and i'd do the same. in one or two minutes it appeared back in sight again as quickly as it had disappeared. it again moved erraticly unlike any aircraft i'd ever seen. we watched it for several minutes before it shot out of sight west. we had never reported the sighting mainly because anytime we brought it up people look at us like we are crazy. mike at this point gets really uncomfortable anytime i bring it up but i feel like i should tell someone. i just saw a show on tv where your orginization were doing investigations on sightings and the part where it encourages people to come forward really rang in my head. i do want to note that in omaha where the object appeared to be around/over is the home of sac (strategic air command). we both feel it is possible this could be a secret military aircraft unlike anything we've ever seen. mike seems to feel more comfortable with this explanation but i'm still not sure what this was. i feel documenting this is important and necessary but unfortunately i'm not able to provide many of the specific details of time and place.  it was on thanksgiving day and was several years ago so as for exact date and time i couldn't say but i am sure it was on thanksgiving. i will try to get in touch with mike and verify the date and time to see if he remembers and will follow up with you if we can come to an agreement on that. i hope this is helpful in any way.
content.summary: Was thanksgiving day driving back from dad's house with roomate

content.detailedDescription: Me and my buddy was driving down the hwy.235 when i noticed a strange light in the sky. i looked at it for a few seconds before i brought it to my friends attention. he then stated that it looked like the moon cut in half but continued to look at it. and after just a few seconds it turned in to just a small light and was gone wich seemed as if it just took off
content.summary: Objetc in sky flying now bright lights just exteiror reflecting light

content.detailedDescription: My middle child (6 at the time) says she woke up in the middle of the night this past summer and came in the living room and saw a human like entity looking at her through the window from the outside. she said it looked white/gray w/ big black eyes and it was waving at her. i also feel like im being watched sometimes by something i cannot see.
content.summary: Daughter saw alien peering through window

content.detailedDescription: I was working as a night gaurd and notice a bright light just above the tree line of a forest boardering the parking lot the light stayed for three maybe four weeks hovering above below and infront of the forest some times as high enogh to above the ski hill behind the forest sometime lower than the trees my coworker decided we should get closer we got as close to the forest as possible then he spotlighted it then it flew rite over to us in les than a second it was rite infront of us hovering it sat there still noise less for a short time maybe 3 mins then turned bega to fly away so fast it was out of veiw in a second and sorry for the bad selling lack of gramaher its hard to tye so much on a hone
content.summary: I was working as a night gaurd.When myself and a co worker observed a ball of light moving frequently around a ski mountain and forest above and below tree level for three weeks

content.detailedDescription:
1. me and my friend were walking to 711, taking a shortcut through the mantua woods in fairfax, virginia.

2. as me and my friend were crossing a steel walk-bridge over a stream in the woods, i noticed, out of the corner of my eye, some light lift up off the ground in front of us. we were no where near it at the time, but could see through the woods to what looked like a large parking lot with a lot of light posts that had orange glows to them. the parking lot was near a building, both of which were probably around a mile or less away. the visibility was good, even though it was completely dark. it was around 4 pm in the fall so it was like night time. there was no rain or clouds. 

3. so when i saw the light come up off of the parking lot, my first instinct told me it must be a helicopter because the light slowly ascended from the ground to around 500 feet or less in the air, and hovered for a few seconds. at this time me and my friend had both seen what had happened so far and were both observing the object.

4. all of a sudden, something like "headlights" came on, and the two beams of light looked a lot like powerful landing lights for a big airplane. the lights, or beams that looked like headlights, had very distinguishable outlines to the beams of lights. as in, the "headlights" were very focused. the reason we could distinguish them as headlights is because they were so focused, and it almost looked like the flying car from the harry potter movie flying through the fog with its lights on.
so at this point the object is hovering and the headlights came on, and the headlights were pointing to my 4 o'clock or so.  all of a sudden, the object made an extremely quick helix-like maneuver towards the treeline. the shape or turnings of the maneuver were evident because the headlights were still on. if it was not for these headlights, i would not have been able to tell there was a s-like, or helix-like maneuver. it happened very quickly, from a standstill, and all of a sudden the object seemed to be heading right for us, extremely fast, over the tree line. the next thing i know, i'm staring straight up at what seemed to be a slowly hovering object with three bright whitish-yellow round lights in a perfectly triangular shape. i have near-sided vision, about -2 in each eye, and since the lights were so bright, i could not determine the shape of the craft itself. however, my friend who was with me, has better vision, and said that the object was a "cross" shape, with the three lights in a triangle formation. this "cross" shape lead him to believe it was some sort of secret military stealth helicopter. this object made absolutely no sound whatsoever, which was the most frightening aspect of all, because even though i couldn't determine the objects shape or size because of my vision, i could tell, or just had the feeling that, this object was huge - immense, in fact. we could even hear the sound of the water flowing gently down stream below us, and the noise of cars on the highway in the distance, even though we were witnessing this strange ufo. at the time when the object was hovering straight over us, we were still at the end of the steel walk bridge, which hand thick railings, and i recall my friend saying "run!" but i said, "no, hide!" and i grabbed him and we hid under the steel railing while it hovered overhead. the object hovered over us, moving very slowly past us, for probably around 30 seconds or more. then, in a flash, it changed trajectories and flew into the sky at a 45 degree angle or so, at unimaginable speed. i mean, it went from ascending from the ground, performing a helix-like maneuver, going very fast in our direction, hover over us quite slowly, and then accelerating at ridiculous speeds into the sky.

5. i was extremely scared and frightened. at the moment we hid under the railing and my friend wanted to run, a thought ran through my head: that whatever the thing in the sky was, it knew we were there, and that running would only give cause for suspicion. also the thought ran through my head, that even in the dark of night running would be hopeless because they must have some sort of infrared vision to detect us or something. i just wanted to hide. so we did. it all happened so fast, or at least it felt that way. i barely talk about it because people i tell think i'm crazy or making it up. sometimes, thinking back on it, i wonder if anything else may have happened that i have no memory of.

6. we lost sight of the object after it changed directions after hovering over us over the steel bridge, when it shot up into the sky at around a 45 degree angle, accelerating at speeds at which no aircraft known to me can do, especially without making any noise.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Ufo took off, activated headlight beams, performed helix maneuver, rushed at us then slowly hovered overhead for less than one minute before zipping into the sky at unimaginable speeds.

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 8:05 p.M. on october 29, 2011 we were returning home from a shopping trip into town when i noticed an oddly bright white light above the trees on a hill to the left (north) of state route 40 east of cambridge, ohio (just past the cemetery). at first i thought is was a light on top a drilling rig, as an oil and gas company has been moving in to that area. but then i noticed that it was moving.

as we proceeded east south east the object slowly crossed over route 40 just ahead of our car. 

i found the objects flight characteristics odd, it didn't dip or sway like a normal slow moving winged aircraft would. 

the white light appeared to dim a little as it crossed the roadway.

 it was at this time that we noticed that there were three lights; one white, one blue and one red. all three lights were lit solid and not blinking like normal aircraft lights. my wife also noted that the object appeared to be tilted forward with the nose pointed down. it wasn���t until it crossed in front of us and continued south over a field as we passed under it���s flight path that i noticed that against the illuminated clouds from the nearby interstate lights that it was a solid dull black triangle shape with a light on each point of the triangle (white on the nose, blue on the right and red on the left). the three points of the triangle appeared to be rounded some what.

it also appeared to gain speed as it traveled farther south away from us before we lost sight of it. 

it's a dark stretch of road with not many places to stop safely, but i watched it as long as i could as my wife was the one driving.

at first i though the light(s)were odd but after seeing that it was one dull solid object it really struck me.
content.summary: I noticed an oddly bright white light just east of cambridge, ohio.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on a flight from sfo and was 5 min out from la about 8:30pm.  out of the  window, i watched a line of planes flying north, one after another.  they all had blinking lights and moved smoothly.  then i realized one plane was different.  it was sort of bouncing, like a stone across water, but at same speed as normal plane.  i though perhaps it was in trouble.  seconds later it shot nearly straight up like a rocket, then quickly moved north, down again, and then south.  once it shot up all its motion was extremely fast.  the cloud cover over la was very heavy, and this all occurred above the cloud layer, so it was definitely a craft and not a toy or balloon.  my plane landed 5 min later. the object looked just like a lighted distant plane initially and i saw no details. i lost sight of the object when it moved south..Not sure what happened.  we began to descend through the cloud layer and the object had moved so quickly it was difficult to track.

i was surprised and wondered if it had taken some sort of evasive action.
content.summary: Strange behavior of object that first appeared to be plane, above cloud near la.

content.detailedDescription: I had just put my son to bed at 2100hrs feb 15th 2011. saying goodnight,i noticed his curtains were slightly open so i leaned over to close them correctly.As i pulled them together i noticed a very large red/orange light moving across the horizon much slower than most things in the sky.At first i just thought it was a plane or helicopter,closed the curtains and turned to return to my wife who was downstairs.I got to his bedroom door and it hit me that this was a strange colour of light for a helicopter or plane, plus it was travelling very slowly,nearly a kind of floaty sort of way.So i returned to the window for another look.After standing in the room for about 5 minutes watching the object pulsing,red in the centre and more orange on the edges, i was sure this was no plane or helicopter and with no noise.I live with hills all round me and you hear planes/helicopters before you see them.But no noise at all from the large light.Another thing is it was following power lines and easily turned with the change in direction of the power lines.The sudden change in direction really caught my attention as i have never seen any flying vehicle change direction so suddenly.The last ten minutes or so i headed outside to watch the object travel east following the power lines below it.I shouted from outside for my wife to come and take a look but she thought i was joking   and would not come out.I live in a small village and have not told any other person as they would think i was crazy,but needed to get it of my chest.I had never seen anything else before or since.
content.summary: Pulsating red/orange object.

content.detailedDescription: My husband went outside to grill steaks while i was watching world series.  about 3 minutes later, he came to the screen door, excited and insisted i come outside.  we live on a ranch and i believed he had spotted a larger than average wild pig. i refused to get up from ball game.  husband continued to insist.  i went out the front door and he asked me to come to the south side of our home.  then he pointed to the lights.  there were 5 spaced out far enough that the object was obviously enormous.  i'm thinking close to football field in length.  there were lights from my vantage point only on one side, the bottom of said object, front to back.  this object was low in the sky. i asked my husband, "what the hell is that?" and he replied, "you tell me.". then he pointed out an airplane flying in the nightsky, stating "that's a plane.". much much smaller, lights were different, speed was faster.  i also noticed the planet venus to the east.  object flew from nprtheast to southwest.  i watched it for 3 minutes until it "glided" beyond my vision.  it was silent.  made absolutely zero noise. i was truly puzzled watching this object attempting to figure out what it was.  we are fairly intelligent people, husband has flying experience.  could not see the shape clearly but trust me, it was large.  it was not a balloon.  husband just wishes to forget the whole thing. i never felt afraid, threatened or scared.  was just really trying my best to figure it out but it never made any sense. for the size it should have made noise.  the positions of the lights made no sense. the lights also blinked in two different rhythms.
content.summary: My husband saw this first and then came to house insisting i come outside to look.  this is my version.  he doesn't wish to talk about the event.

content.detailedDescription: I have game camera's set out to watch wildlife and on october 7th 2011 at 8:45 pm a object with multiple lights was spotted on 1 of the camera's.. the video is 30 seconds long.. i have viewed this video multiple times and have counted up to 8 lights on it , it appears to spin at times.. as a hunter who has spent countless hours in the fields and timber , i have never witnessed anything like this , in person or on my game camera's.. the object seemed to "float" down from above the camera , came close to landing , then banked to the left and appeared to gain altitude , later in the video it appeared again and started rising , gaining altitude.. there is a deer in the video that seemed bewildered but yet interested in the object.. i am an average person with no experience with ufo's.. video needs to be brightened to view the full effect of the sighting..
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Unidentified object with lights caught on game camera

content.detailedDescription:
As reported to mo asd by phone: 

"i took the dog outside the back of the house and waited for him on the deck.  i noticed a white light in the woods behind our house and watched it as it moved back and forth among the trees.  i was looking se. at first i thought it was a flashlight and someone was walking in the woods, but then two more white balls of light came in to view, and then two more, for a total of five. they moved around randomly, up and down, side to side, sometimes fast and sometimes slow.  they just looked like balls of light that glowed all over.  the lights were unwavering and although they were white, looked like a rainbow of color at times. one of them came out of the woods into my yard, only about 25 feet from where i was standing, and about 6' off the ground, hovered there for a minute, then went back into the woods with the others.  i knew then that they were definitely not flashlights. 

the dog barked at the one light and chased it back into the woods.  i called the dog back and he did come running back as if he was scared of something. he wined, too.  i took him inside and locked the door but continued to watch through the sliding glass door. my wife was not home and she had the camera so i couldn't get any pictures. the balls of light stayed in the area for about 45 minutes then all at once they shot upwards into the sky and disappeared. i've never seen anything like this and was stunned. i am an engineer and have never seen anything like it and cannot explain this.  i watched for another hour after and then went to bed without seeing anything else.  when i talked to my wife in the morning after she got home from work (she is a nurse working nights)she said that she heard about something similar that her mother and aunt saw when they were kids.  when i heard about the news reports of ufos i thought this might be related somehow."
content.summary: Small spheres of white light danced around trees in our back yard and into the woods

content.detailedDescription:
we observed the star-like object in the western night sky for several hours.  we first sighted the object around 2:30 am while looking at the auroras.  the night sky was cold and clear. the object caught our eye because of the rapid directional movement in many directions although seeming to follow at northerly direction. however it did backtrack, made turns, changed directions, all at extreme high speeds.  at times, it seemed to be following a pattern. there is no doubt it was a under control flight pattern.  the controlled pattern was like a helicopter but at light speed.  no helicopter i know of can travel in outer space and at that speed.

     we were amazed at the speed of movement, directional changes, and the apparent controlled pattern.  the pattern was randomly changed but still in a northerly direction, like as on a mapping line.  the size seemed much larger than a satellite and never traveled a path as we have seen before.  
also, the length of time, 3-4 hours, we were able to observe this was amazing.  this was not a brief sighting.  the time frame was like watching a video.  we are in a location where there are many international flight patterns and this was not one of them.  no resembelence at all.  we live remotely, well beyond any city lights.  we never lost sight of the object, we went to bed with it still heading north.  we will be watching to see if this repeats.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Star like object observe moving beyond atmosphere, changing dirction rapidly at high speed.  defintly was under control,  n-ne direction, backtracking at times.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside at 7:50 to have a cig the reason i am so specific on the time is because i called my husband after i sat down so i went back and checked my cell phone for the exact time. as soon as i sat down i called him and i was looking towards the south scanning the sky i am an  avid star gazeri could only see a couple stars due to cloud cover wjen all of a sudden a large formation caught my eye gliding from the east towards the me i have a large fir tree that blocks my view to the east and as soon as it passed the tree i saw it i instantly told my husband to hold on and i dropped the phone and stred at this large letter a formation of what i thought at first must be white birds flying in formation but then i witnessed it fly perfectly still like a hang glider with no sound at all right over me the white lights stayed in perfect formation with equal distance between all lights as soon as it was to the right of me (west) it abruptly cganged shape into a line and then it looked like it was going to change into o diamond and then it was gone it just vanished i wasnt sure if it flew into the cloud bank or dissappeared. i picked the phone up and started to tell my husband about it i wanted to say it was birds but i knew it couldnt be i have lived here in port angeles my whole life and i am very familuer with canadian geese and ducks flyung in v formation and when they fly you can here them coming this object was so low and so close but there was no noise at all almost eeriely quiet. i have seen weird lights in this arwa vefore but i have never seen anything like this in my entire life. also we are a very small town we dont have any bright city lights our tallest building is 3 stories tall and i live on a very dark block there were not any lights in the area that could have illuminated this if they were birds. i was very excited when i saw this i would say it was as high as a 7 story building and as large as a jumbo jet maybe five lights on each sidw of the v with 3 or 4 spanning across to form the letter a formation. the white lights looked like diamond shape and they weren't really bright like lights they looked more glowing. i was only able to witness this for about ten seconds before it disappeared. please contact me if you have any questions. thank you
content.summary: Large a formation of white lights looked like a flock of white birds

content.detailedDescription:
As reported to mo asd by phone - the witness would not leave any contact information for follow-up.  this is an historical case. 

"my husband and i were driving to work for the night shift at bendix.  we were driving on highway 2 headed east towards harrisonville, mo when we noticed a large disc shaped craft hovering over a field to our north. the craft had these small balls of bright white light around it - maybe 15 or so - and they would fly quickly away from the craft, go down to the ground or in the trees in different directions, then back to the large craft.  

they were dancing all around the large craft and it was very beautiful to look at. as we drove by the craft it started to move in the same direction we were headed. i knew it was a ufo and tried to get my husband to stop, but he refused and kept driving.  he sped the car up to 70 mph because he was scared.  i wasn't scared, and yelled at them out of the window - saying hello and "come here" to them.  suddenly, about 12 of the white balls of light came down on either side of our car and followed along with us at the same rate of speed. they were all the same size - less than 12" in diameter.  some were 50 feet away, and some were 10 feet away from the car.  he was driving a 1978 dodge charger.  i wanted to talk to them, but my husband kept telling me to shut up, and sped the car up to 120 mph but the lights just kept up with us at the same speed! he was very afraid, but for some reason i wasn't. he wasn't talking at all except to tell me to be quiet. i felt like i knew the lights for some reason, and was happy to see them.  i think that the lights are some type of aliens.  the next thing we knew we were arriving at work and were 45 minutes late!  i could not understand it because he was driving so fast we should have been early, but we were late.  i don't remember seeing the large craft or the white lights go out of sight.

several years later i had some dental work done and had a wisdom tooth extracted.  the dentist found something in my jaw that shouldn't have been there.  he asked me if i had ever had any dental surgery and i said no, never.  he said nothing showed up on the x-rays, but that there was this crystal tooth in my jaw, wrapped around my jaw and just under the gum next to my back wisdom tooth that was taken out that day.  he was fascinated with it and wanted to keep it so i let him have it.  the thing looked like a real tooth but was crystal.  i was a little afraid of what it might be and didn't want it.  now i wish i had kept it because i found a magazine article that mentioned implants like the one i had that could be from an alien origin and some kind of tracking device.  

i have seen strange things several times in my life and believe that we are being visited by ufos from other planets. 

my husband and i divorced 15 years ago, mostly because of that night and other strange things that he thought i was responsible for. i just had to tell someone what i saw because i can't talk to anyone i know about it.  but it did happen and this is real.
content.summary: Balls of light chase our car while large craft hovers nearby

content.detailedDescription:
As reported to mo asd by phone (witness wished to remain anonymous and refused to leave contact information). she has no computer, only internet on her cell phone so did not want to file online.  my number is the only one she could find. she has a second report for missouri that i'm posting.

"i was headed home from work one evening in november of 2010.  i was in overland park, kansas. i turned on to santa fe road and headed east when i noticed a gigantic triangular craft hoovering over some large houses in a nice area off of santa fe and pflumm road. i was approximately six blocks from the object. the homes in this area are all very large. the craft was projecting a white beam of light over the houses, and the light was moving back and forth like it was scanning the area.  i watched it as i drove and then the beam went back up, not suddenly, but slowly from the ground up to the craft.  then the craft started moving east in the same direction that i was driving, then it changed direction suddenly and headed south.  it moved out of my sight behind trees.  it was moving very slowly the entire time. the thing was that this object was gigantic - it was at least a mile wide if not more.  i can't believe that other people did not see this and report it."
content.summary: Gigantic black triangle projected a beam over houses

content.detailedDescription:
As reported to asd by phone: 
(the witness wishes to remain anonymous)

"i was driving north on 435 highway from overland park to kansas city north on my way home from doing a video shoot for a commercial. i am a professional videographer and so is my wife, who was with me.  as we came around the curve at the 470 interchange i noticed a large diamond shaped craft moving very slowly along my right side (east) approximately 1000 yards from the highway and approximately 500 feet in altitude. it was 9:50 p.M. at that time.  the object had a continuous white light all over the exterior sides of the bottom of the craft, and another continuous blue light just inside that one. it was a beautiful medium blue color that i can't describe, and while the white and blue lights were very bright, they had a soft glow to them, too.  the dark craft (i think grey) reflected the lights.  it appeared that the top of the craft was kind of domed in the same diamond shape, and the bottom was flat except for the lights. at first i thought it was some kind of blimp but soon realized it wasn't.  i've never seen anything like it in 33 years!  

it continued along the same path for a few minutes until as i approached the i-70 exit the object stopped and hoovered for approximately 20 seconds.  i was driving and told my wife to watch the object. she was getting very excited about it and watched it the entire time.  i had to keep watching the road and slowed down to 50 mph so we could see it better, but there was no place to turn off.  there were no clouds out and it was difficult to tell what the altitude was, but it was flying very low, too low in fact.  a commercial airliner flew over this craft headed se to nw, but was flying at high altitude. 

then, just as we passed the i-70 exit, the object turned to the west and headed that direction, again very slowly, and passed over the highway just as we went underneath it.  my wife was saying oh my god, oh my god over and over again.  we saw two cars in front of us slow down and it looked like they were watching it, too, but again, there was no safe place to pull over and at this point, i did not want to stop anyway for fear of what might happen. the car radio, which was off, made a crackling noise for a few seconds, then a burst of some type. my wife said "what the _____ was that?  she was trying frantically to get her cell phone camera to work when the phone went completely dead.  she had the phone charged up fully before we left the house earlier before the video shoot, and only used it a couple of times so that battery should not have died! my camera was in the bag in the trunk and i couldn't get it. 

then, just after the craft crossed the highway, maybe 100 yards past the highway, it took off at a very high rate of speed directly west towards kansas.  i'd guess that it was traveling at 750 mph or more, at an instant without any time to accelerate like a normal airplane would.  there were no features or lights on this craft that would indicate it was a common aircraft.  it disappeared from view within five seconds! 

when we got home we called some friends to tell them what we saw, and they told us that they saw some strange white balls of light around their tree line at their house earlier in the evening and their neighbors saw them, too.  a couple of days later i heard about all of the ufo sightings in the area on the news and decided to find out where to file a report.  that is when i found the missouri mufon website and called.  

i am a pilot and my father is a pilot.  he has his own cessna caravan 208b that i've flown with him in for years as a co-pilot from the time i was 14 years old.  i can tell you that this object was no plane. if it was one of ours it was flying illegally without the proper warning lights and it was below 1,000 feet.  i'd really like to know what it was!"  due to my father's work and my work, i have to remain anonymous.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Huge diamond shaped craft with blue and white lights over 435 hwy

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my backyard w. my dog and taking pictures of the clouds.  saw jet high in the south (toward the sun) and then notices a reflection a least 20 feet below it and started taking pictures in that area. reviewing the pictures later that evening, orbs are in the photos.

i should say that activity has increased for  due to communications through thoughts. i know how this sounds but it's true.
content.summary: Jet in area, saw reflection below jet and took pictures-reviewed pictures and orbs are in photos

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i witnessed another ufo tonight at approx.7:00pm, my wife spotted it first and pointed it out to me the direction from our home was south south west above the tree lines behind our home.
we thought it might be a planet at first, we looked around and we could not see any stars in the sky, we still had enough daylight. 
it was metallic extremely bright, brighter than any star that came out afterwards, almost reflective, with a non nondescript shape. 
it stayed stationary for at least 5-7 minutes.  my wife says "it felt like it was the same object" she saw before but in a different location.
i got my binoculars out and watched for a while it was oblong; i sat down on a chair for comfort, and could see it.  i got up and leaned on the house wall to steady myself and continuing to see it.
then i thought i will sat down again to be more comfortable, and the strangest thing is, it was not in the same location as before it had moved downward behind some branches yet still visible. 
we decided to go around the front of the house to get another perspective, but it suddenly was not there anymore, just vanished as it had never been there!
content.summary: We saw another ufo tonight brighter than any star

content.detailedDescription:
During a holiday in the us we were enroute from flagstaff to monument valley. enroute to monument valley i took several photographs but noticed nothing special. after a first review back home i didn't notice anything in my pictures as i quickle browsed through them looking for the best ones. except now when i reviewed them again piece by piece with a relative who came back from the same area last week.

i noticed a greenish oval/dome shaped object seemingly diving into a canyon. the date stamp on the camera is 2 februari 2011 at 18:43hrs gmt+1 time. at 20:58 we were at the 'welcome to utah' billboard at monument valley. using google maps i estimate (using the travel time set at fixed legal speed) that the odd picture must have been snapped in the area of cameron, az. it is alongside the interstate 89 then we went to i-160 and i-163.

the picture was snapped from inside the car with the windows up (closed). all other pictures do show some dirt spots from the windows but none that even come close to this oddity.
content.summary: Odd object photographed going into canyon

content.detailedDescription: A family member and myself were waiting to leave from a resturant that was next to a housing area. we looked up towards the southwest where we heard and saw a dark/black helicopter coming in low from and near by a residential area.  a bright light came in kinda like the ships from starwars leaving hyper space and started following the unidentified black or dark hellicopter. it slowly moved toward the east then north. at first it looked like a airplane from a distance untill it was obviously closer then it was just a very bright light moving in a very slow zigzag pattern. the closer it came toward us and the brighter it became the more of its arua you could see. we then left to go follow it which was annoying cause sometimes ufo's look like they're in one place but in another. once we got moving it was above a residential area and i could actually see it and what it was. it was like a cylinder flying upright with a silver round bubble top and a black bottom. hard to tell the middle due to the light coming from it and the auru around it which was turning yellowish by then. we passed behind a tree doing 40mph and then it was gone. drove around for 10 minutes while getting up on a hill within minutes just in case it was a plane so we could see its lights. we saw nothing in the area and left. my picture is crude but hope it helps.
content.summary: Ufo following helicopter near and in a residential area
